title: Gender Classification Model
description: Indeed, two people can never have the same fingerprints, it is unique in every human. But using fingerprints we can classify gender, whether it’s male or female. In this article, I will take you through a Gender Classification Model which I will train using Deep Learning and Convolutional Neural Networks.Now you must be thinking about how I will do Gender Classification. I will build a Convolutional Neural Network that can classify the gender using the fingerprints. For this task, I will use a dataset that contains over 55000 images of fingerprints of each finger.Also, Read – Work on Artificial Intelligence Projects.
